content:
I am getting a bad link to the definitions output for a profile derived from the vitals profile. 

error   The link 'StructureDefinition-pediatric-bmi-for-age-definitions.html#Observation.valueQuantity.value' for "value" cannot be resolved (valid targets: [page-content-wrapper, Observation.encounter, Observation.code.coding.userSelected, Observation.referenceRan ....

This link should be StructureDefinition-pediatric-bmi-for-age-definitions.html#Observation.value[x]:valueQuantity.value but is being generated as above.

Here is the SD file: http://build.fhir.org/ig/argonautproject/R4/branches/master/StructureDefinition-pediatric-bmi-for-age.html
Interestingly this does not create an error in US Core from whence it came: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition-pediatric-bmi-for-age.html

so since the publication of the latest us core and now the snapshot seems to have been changed to break these links. Either my definitions were previously wrong or this is a build error.
here are the link address for US Core (STU3)

link address to definitions from Diff view (same as in Argo R4 and which is causing the above error): http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition-pediatric-bmi-for-age-definitions.html#Observation.valueQuantity.value

link address in the definitions tab( is different from Argo R4 missing the ':valueQuantity'): http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition-pediatric-bmi-for-age-definitions.html#Observation.value[x].value

so they don't match is US Core either but it works. ( no link errors)
on my list (which is gorwing pretty fast today)
OK thanks.... not needed for this ballot cycle but soon after
well, I can improve this one, but not fix it until after the technical corrections are released - some of the broken links come out the core spec
